verses.text: \w Remember|strong="H2142"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H7200"\w*: \w consider|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*.

Our \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w aliens|strong="H5237"\w*: our \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w*.

We \w are|strong="H0369"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w orphans|strong="H3490"\w* \w without|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: \w our|strong="H1961"\w* \w mothers|strong="H0517"\w* \w are|strong="H0369"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w widows|strong="H0490"\w*.

We \w have|strong="H4325"\w* \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w* \w our|strong="H0935"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*: we \w have|strong="H4325"\w* bought \w our|strong="H0935"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*.

We \w were|strong="H7291"\w* dragged \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w necks|strong="H6677"\w*, we \w were|strong="H7291"\w* \w weary|strong="H3021"\w* \w and|strong="H6677"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w given|strong="H5117"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.

We \w have|strong="H7646"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4713"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* Assyrians, \w that|strong="H3027"\w* we might \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

\w Our|strong="H0369"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w are|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w*: \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w borne|strong="H5445"\w* \w their|strong="H5445"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w Servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w ruled|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H3027"\w*: \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* redeem \w us|strong="H3027"\w* \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H0369"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w We|strong="H5315"\w* fetched \w our|strong="H0935"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w at|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* peril \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w our|strong="H0935"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*.

\w Our|strong="H6440"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w was|strong="H7458"\w* burnt \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* \w oven|strong="H8574"\w*, \w by|strong="H6440"\w* reason \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* violence \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*.

They \w oppressed|strong="H6031"\w* \w the|strong="H3063"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w in|strong="H0802"\w* Sion, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3063"\w* \w virgins|strong="H1330"\w* \w in|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H3063"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0802"\w* Juda.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w were|strong="H3027"\w* \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* up \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w respect|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* persons \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ancient.

\w They|strong="H5375"\w* abused \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* indecently: \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w children|strong="H5288"\w* fell \w under|strong="H3782"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8179"\w* ancients \w have|strong="H8179"\w* ceased \w from|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H8179"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*: \w the|strong="H8179"\w* \w young|strong="H0970"\w* \w men|strong="H0970"\w* \w from|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H8179"\w* choir \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H8179"\w* singers.

\w The|strong="H2015"\w* \w joy|strong="H4885"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* our \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* ceased, our \w dancing|strong="H4234"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w into|strong="H2015"\w* \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* \w is|strong="H7218"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w from|strong="H5307"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w woe|strong="H0188"\w* \w to|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* sorrowful, \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w dim|strong="H2821"\w*,

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* Sion, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H6726"\w* destroyed, \w foxes|strong="H7776"\w* \w have|strong="H2022"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0859"\w* thou, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, shalt \w remain|strong="H3427"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, thy \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* wilt thou \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w ever|strong="H7911"\w*? \w why|strong="H4100"\w* wilt thou \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3117"\w* \w long|strong="H0753"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*?

Convert \w us|strong="H0413"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w converted|strong="H7725"\w*: \w renew|strong="H2318"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* beginning.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w utterly|strong="H3966"\w* \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, thou art \w exceedingly|strong="H3966"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.
